evidence.claim: JenCare utilizes HIPAA compliance to ensure patient data protection.
The integration with EHR systems aligns with HL7 standards to facilitate smooth data exchange.
JenCare's data management practices include adherence to X12 transaction sets for billing.
The organization focuses on FHIR to enhance inter-operability with health data APIs.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare operations indicates need for EDI and X12 transactions.
matched_use_cases: healthcare transactions between providers and payers
